Comment: In Australia we have a similar issue, on May the 3rd we vote in the federal election for either a Temu Trump or a Labor (Left Wing) Government. Labor is presently the party in power and has faced a lot of criticism over the cost of living. The conservatives were far ahead in the polls prior to Trump taking office but since taking office and reminding the world what Trumpism is actually like Labor is now ahead in the polls and looking like they may secure a majority Government.
